title: How and where can I watch scam 1992, the new web series? - Quora

response.answer_text: Watch the popular Indian series Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story on the SonyLIV app. This webs series is about the stockbroker Harshad Mehta who pulled out the biggest scam of India in 1992. This series is based on the book by financial journalist Sucheta Dalal and Debashis Basu. They exposed this scam back then with the help of their sources in BSE.
